project.name: ${project.artifactId}-${project.version}
project.description: Project ${project.groupId} ${project.artifactId}-${project.version} is my root pom with plugins configurations

configuration.options: passfail:false, maxerr:100, unused:true, freeze:true, maxcomplexity:10, debug:false, devel:false, curly:true, es5:false, esnext:true, strict:true, globalstrict:false, asi:true, laxbreak:true, bitwise:false, boss:false, eqeqeq:true, eqnull:true, evil:true, expr:true, forin:true, immed:true, latedef:true, loopfunc:true, noarg:true, regexp:true, regexdash:false, scripturl:true, shadow:true, supernew:false, undef:true, lastsemic:true, newcap:false, noempty:true, nonew:true, nomen:false, onevar:false, onecase:false, plusplus:false, proto:false, sub:true, trailing:true

requireMavenVersion.message: [ERROR] This project requires Maven ${maven.version} or higher

excludes.message: [ERROR] All logs should be delegated to our log API

configuration.source: log.warn('+') log.warn('| -> {}: before commit YOU MUST compile projects with enforcers!', ('${user.name}').toUpperCase()) log.warn('+')
